author: CBC News
title: Governor General's office reminds Canadians they can't dissolve the government by contacting her | CBC News
description: The office of Governor General Mary Simon is telling Canadians that they can't dissolve the federal government simply by contacting her office.
content:
The office of Governor General Mary Simon is telling Canadians that they can't dissolve the federal government simply by contacting her office.
